mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_link_locale_stats ( full_short_url, gid, date, cnt, province, city, adcode, country, create_time, update_time, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{fullShortUrl}, #{gid}, #{date}, #{cnt}, #{province}, #{city}, #{adcode}, #{country}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{delFlag} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cnt = cnt + #{cnt}, update_time = #{updateTime};
mapper.select:
SELECT lls.full_short_url, SUM(lls.cnt) AS cnt FROM t_link_locale_stats lls
inner join t_link l on lls.full_short_url = l.full_short_url and lls.gid = l.gid and l.del_flag = 0
WHERE lls.gid = #{gid} AND lls.full_short_url = #{fullShortUrl} AND lls.del_flag = 0 AND lls.date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} GROUP BY lls.full_short_url, lls.gid, lls.province
